```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
expressions <- read_csv("../../app/tidy_data/tidy_expressions.csv")
```

```{r}
expressions %>% 
  group_by(condition) %>% 
  summarise(average = mean(value), variance = var(value))
```
